name: UIMenuElement
desc: An object representing a menu, action, or command.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title of the menu element.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: The image to display alongside the menu element's title.

items.name: struct UIMenuElement.Attributes
items.desc: Attributes that determine the style of the menu element.

items.name: enum UIMenuElement.State
items.desc: Constants that indicate the state of an action- or command-based menu element.
